pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ScoutrScoutr was built as a means to provide a simple way to put an API in front of a NoSQL backend and ensure full role-based access control (RBAC) integration with audit logging.A Golang implementation is available at https://github.com/MichaelPalmer1/scoutr-go.## DocumentationDocumentation is available at [https://geskunkworks.github.io/scoutr/](https://geskunkworks.github.io/scoutr/).
